title: According to the teaser, Ivern is some tree that protects the life nature of the jungle
body:
And in Boards, everyone thinks he's a jungler.

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nfv9UlLrH8k/VAuLqEUY_FI/AAAAAAAAQbg/ryAo0sehTuM/s1600/Oh-the-Irony.jpg

replies.body:
Um, because he is? Look at his kit.
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-reveal-ivern-green-father

I don't know, man - I'm gonna play him as a roaming support who counter-jungles on the side.

Imagine - Smite/Exhaust, start out at the enemy's buff, plant a grove and auto-harvest with Smite, then just walk back to lane.

I'm going to play him as a hybrid carry.

{{item:3115}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3100}} 

(or if jungling, replace Nashors with {{item:1419}}).

W damage applies to towers.

Yep, just tried him out - attack speed/on-hit is pretty effective. And can we just mention the fact that he automatically makes it possible to have 4 red/blue buffs on his team at once, just by existing in the game?
Oh mb, didn't noticed this link.
He's basically a support and a jungler, which means that salty teammate you have doesn't have to choose which one to blame when he goes 0/7/0.
